description:
MongoDB users in Belgium are all united in this group. Meetups will be held every 3 months. Talk proposals can be sent to vandevreken.hannes@gmail.com.

See you at the next meetup!

description: This group is a place for developers to learn more about MongoDB, an open source, document-oriented, nosql database. If you are facing challenges with MySQL or Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative, please join us.

description: Las Vegas MongoDB user's group. Every meeting we seek to go both medium and deeper, and also help for newer folks. While centered on MongoDB, we also seek to be an open community.

description:
MongoDB User Group for all levels!

We'll aim to meet once a month and discuss implementing MongoDB - mainly from the developer's perspective. MongoDB is a NoSQL database - more info on MongoDB is available at http://www.mongodb.org/ We'll also be following the MongoDB online training run by 10gen.

Venue for meetups is yet to be decided, but it will be in Cambridge. We'll wait to see how much interest there is before booking the Corn Exchange! We're also on the look out for sponsors and/or hosts, so if anyone can help out there, please get in touch!
name: MongoDB Cambridge

description: I'm a big fan of MongoDB and we use it quite extensively at my company (Cloud CMS). We'd like to promote the use of MongoDB - the premier document-oriented NoSQL database - among the Cleveland business and tech community!

description: MongoDB Iasi User Group This group is a place for developers to learn more about the open source, JSON-based document database MongoDB from 10gen the leading NoSQL database. If you have a big data challenge ahead or would like to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative to the traditional MySQL, Postgres or Oracle please join us at one of our monthly sessions a context in which we like to share knowledge, experience and have some genuine fun.
name: Iasi MongoDB-User-Group

description:
Our group is about modern web- and data technologies. We meet to learn and discuss new ways working with data. We do talks and work shops.

We're about exchanging our knowledge and ideas in a collegial, respectful manner.

For more information visit our website.

If you are interested in data and web stuff or mongoDB in particular this is the place to be. No matter if you are an expert or just curious.

If you have a basic understanding of programming and databases  there is nothing to worry about. We all have started small.

We want to build up and curate a strong, open community in the Rhine-Neckar area. Exchange of ideas and expertise, help new users.

Maybe world domination.

Most of the time we speak English since we are are diverse group of people from all over the world. Don't worry if your Englisch is not pörfekt.

Members of our group are open, considerate & respectful. Our group is a diverse set of skills, personalities, and experiences.

See You!
name: Mannheim MongoDB User Group

description: This is a group for those interested in learning more about MongoDB!
name: Victoria MongoDB Meetup

description: A place for IT professionals and students around Georgia to learn more about the non-relational, open source, document-oriented database - MongoDB. MongoDB is the leading NoSQL database. If you are facing challenges with MySQL or Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, salable alternative, please join us at our sessions.

description:
Vancouver MongoDB User Group (MUG)

This is a group for anyone interested in MongoDB use cases, studies and operation best practices. Whether you are a DBA or a developer new to MongoDB, all skills levels are welcome! If you are currently having challenges scaling your database backend and are considering a more scalable, flexible way to grow your database backend, please join us at one of our meetings.

Looking forward to meeting everyone and making this an awesome meetup group.
name: Vancouver MongoDB User Group

description:
This group is a place for developers to learn more about the open source, JSON-based document database MongoDB. MongoDB is the leading NoSQL database and many of the key committers are based right here in New York City. So if you are facing challenges with MySQL, Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative, please join us at one of our monthly sessions. We typically meet on the third Tuesday of the month, have some pizza and network, and enjoy a presentation on MongoDB.

Membership in the group is governed by our Community Code of Conduct.
name: New York MongoDB User Group

description:
MongoDB is an open source, document-oriented distributed database with flexible schema, querying, and indexing. We invite users of any experience level to come to our meetups to learn, share, and meet with the MongoDB community. If you have any suggestions for talks/demos you would like to attend (or present!) please contact the meetup organizers.

To learn more about MongoDB, visit: 

• What is MongoDB? 

• MongoDB Documentation 

• MongoDB University 

For MongoDB-related technical assistance, see Technical Support options.

description: For users of the non-relational, open source, document-oriented database MongoDB. We meet once a month to discuss everything MongoDB including the MEAN Stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS and Node.js) and other MongoDB recipes! If you want to speak at the group, give a workshop or help organize an event, just get in touch, we would love to work together.

description:
O objetivo desse grupo é reunir usuários, desenvolvedores, interessados e curiosos para discutir implementações, técnicas, receitas de bolo e cases de MongoDB. 

Se você utiliza, pensa em utilizar ou apenas tem curiosidade sobre MongoDB (e NoSQL em geral), junte-se ao Meetup.

Sobre o MongoDB:

MongoDB (do "humongous") é uma aplicação de código aberto, de alta performance, sem esquemas, orientado à documentos. Foi escrito na linguagem de programação C++. O banco de dados orientado à documentos, sendo formado por um conjunto de documentos JSON. Muitas aplicações podem, dessa forma, modelar informações de um modo muito mais natural, pois os dados podem ser aninhados em complexas hierarquias e continuar a ser indexáveis e fáceis de buscar.

O desenvolvimento do MongoDB começou em outubro de 2007 pela 10gen. A primeira versão pública foi lançada em fevereiro de 2009. (fonte: Wikipedia)

description:
Welcome to the Barcelona MongoDB User Group!  Once we were the sole forum for MongoDB users in Spain, and contained all meetings happening across the country for MongoDB. However, we are very pleased to now be one of several Spanish MongoDB User Groups -- including our friends in Madrid and Mallorca!

You are welcome to join this group, even if you are not based in Barcelona -- however, if you are closer geographically to one of our other groups they might be more relevant for you.

The purpose of the group is for users and people interested in using MongoDB to be able to meet up with like-minded people. Anything around MongoDB goes, even including using MongoDB other NoSQL solutions. Usually the meeting will have at least one presentation.

Se você utiliza, pensa em utilizar ou apenas tem curiosidade sobre MongoDB (e NoSQL em geral), junte-se ao Meetup.

Sobre o MongoDB:

MongoDB (do "humongous") é uma aplicação de código aberto, de alta performance, sem esquemas, orientado à documentos. Foi escrito na linguagem de programação C++. O banco de dados orientado à documentos, sendo formado por um conjunto de documentos JSON. Muitas aplicações podem, dessa forma, modelar informações de um modo muito mais natural, pois os dados podem ser aninhados em complexas hierarquias e continuar a ser indexáveis e fáceis de buscar.

description:
Éste es el Meetup Group para la comunidad de usuarios de MongoDB en el Perú.

MongoDB, nombre que proviene de "humongous" ("descomunal" en inglés). Aquí se abordará casi todo relacionado con el banco de datos NoSQL MongoDB: instalación, exploración, desarrollo, mantenimiento, etc.

Podemos encontrarnos en los siguientes sitios:

  • https://bit.ly/mongodbperu (Lista de correos)
  • https://facebook.com/mongodbperu
  • https://twitter.com/mongodbperu
  • https://plus.google.com/communities/111761925906849299746
name: MongoDB Perú

description: This group is a place for developers to learn more about MongoDB, an open source, document-oriented, nosql database. If you are facing challenges with MySQL or Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative, please join us at one of our monthly sessions.

description: This group is a place for developers to learn more about the non-relational, open source, document-oriented database MongoDB. We're excited to have you join us for a presentation on MongoDB.

description: This group is a place for developers to learn more about the non-relational, open source, document-oriented database MongoDB. So if you are facing challenges with MySQL or Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable, and fun alternative, please join us at one of our monthly sessions.

description: This group is a place for developers to learn more about the open source, JSON-based document database MongoDB. MongoDB is the leading NoSQL database. So if you are facing challenges with MySQL, Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative, please join us at one of our monthly sessions. We typically meet on the third Tuesday of the month, have some pizza and network, and enjoy a presentation on MongoDB.

description: The purpose of the group is for users and people interested in using MongoDB to be able to meet up with like-minded people. Anything around MongoDB goes, even including using MongoDB other NoSQL solutions. Usually the meeting will have at least one presentation.
name: Málaga MongoDB User Group

description:
Bergen NoSQL User Group is a place for developers to learn more and share their experiences about all the new and shiny NoSQL databases. We discuss databases such as MongoDB and CouchDB document stores; Neo4J and Giraph graph stores; Riak, Berkeley DB and Redis key-value stores, and Cassandra and HBase wide-column stores; and many many more!

If you are facing challenges with MySQL or Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative, please join us at one of our meetups.
name: Bergen NoSQL User Group

description: This group is a place for developers to learn more about the open source, JSON-based document database MongoDB. MongoDB is the leading NoSQL database and more people are adopting MongoDB everyday. So if you are facing challenges with MySQL, Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative, please join us at one of our user group meetups. Our meetups typically consist of some pizza, networking and a presentation on MongoDB.
name: Little Rock MongoDB User Group

description:
This group is a place for developers, data analysts and BI experts to learn more about the non-relational, open source, document-oriented database MongoDB, which is the leading so-called "NoSQL" solution. So if you are facing challenges with MySQL or Postgres or Oracle and want to explore a more flexible, scalable alternative, please join us at one of our monthly (or so) sessions.


Our goal is simply to share and exchange know-how, connect and have fun - online and offline. I'm sure there are a lot of people out there who share the same interests, so here's our chance to come together.
name: Mumbai MongoDB User Group

name: Moscow MongoDB Meetup

description:
Este grupo es un lugar para que desarrolladores aprendan más acerca de MongoDB la base de datos no-relacional, open source y basada en documentos. MongoDB está cambiando la forma como los desarrolladores construyen aplicaciones y tiene una comunidad que crece cada vez más en el mundo entero. Si estas enfrentando desafíos con MySQL, Postgres u Oracle y quieres explorar la productividad, la facilidad de uso y la escalabilidad, entre otras características únicas que MongoDB ofrece; ¡Únete con nosotros! y vive una de nuestras sesiones mensuales. Y si tienes alguna experiencia con MongoDB para compartir, ¡Háznoslo saber!, ¡Estaremos encantados de conocerte!

English Version:
This group is a place for developers to learn more about the non-relational, open source, document database MongoDB. MongoDB is changing the way developers build applications and has built a thriving global community that you can join. If you are facing challenges with MySQL or Postgres or Oracle and want to explore MongoDB’s developer productivity, ease of use and scalability, please join us at one of our monthly sessions. If you have MongoDB experience to share, let us know! We would love to have you present!
name: Cali MongoDB User Group

description:
Il gruppo si rivolte a sviluppatori, responsabili IT, DevOps e tutti coloro che vogliono scoprire, discutere e condividere le proprie esperienze su MongoDB.

MongoDB è un database NoSQL , open source ed orientato ai documenti che offre un'alternativa flessibile, scalabili  e agile ai tradizionali database relazionali MySQL, Postgres o Oracle.

L'obiettivo del gruppo è crescere e condividere le esperienze! Cosa aspettate unitevi al gruppo!
name: Padova MongoDB User Group

description: This is a group for those interested in learning more about the Open Source database MongoDB. All levels of experience are welcome. So whether you've been playing with MongoDB for a few months, or have built and scaled a robust MongoDB powered website, this group is for you. We will plan to meet once a month and will focus on presentations, hackathons and study sessions. We'd love to hear what you'd like to see out of the group and how you can help contribute to this growing community.
name: Dallas mongoDB Meetup

description: C and C++ software development and related topics
